tasks.task_description: Create Cloudflare Workers API with D1, KV, R2 integration
Build enhanced frontend assets for CF Pages

description: Recreate SSDP platform optimized for Cloudflare deployment with Workers, KV, R2, D1, and Pages
context: Created comprehensive Cloudflare-optimized SSDP platform with Workers API (D1, KV, R2 integration), enhanced frontend assets with advanced CSS/JS, wrangler configuration, D1 database schema, and deployment scripts

Successfully created and deployed comprehensive Cloudflare-optimized SSDP platform with Workers API, D1 database, KV caching, R2 storage, enhanced frontend assets, PWA support, and automated deployment scripts. All changes committed and pushed to GitHub.
